text: If you insist on giving credit to the camel's lies, to the tricky stories running through the courtyards of inns, to the promises of women covered in veils and procaces in their offerings; if you persist in ignoring certain unwritten laws on the stealthy conduct to be followed when crossing the lands of the unbelievers, if you continue in your folly, you will never be allowed to enter the gates of the city of Tashkent, the city where abundance reigns and wise and diligent men predominate. If you persist in your foolishness...
title: Si te empeñas
author: Álvaro Mutis
